input_text:
Job Title: SR Data Scientist

Location: Marlborough, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Join our team of more than 34,000 team members, supporting our members and communities in our Club Support Center, 235+ clubs and eight distribution centers. BJ’s Wholesale Club offers a collaborative and inclusive environment where all team members can learn, grow and be their authentic selves. Together, we’re committed to providing outstanding service and convenience to our members, helping them save on the products and services they need for their families and homes. 

The Benefits Of Working At BJ’s

 BJ’s pays weekly Generous time off programs to support busy lifestyles*Vacation, Personal, Holiday, Sick, Bereavement Leave, Jury Duty Benefit plans for your changing needs*Three medical plans**, Health Reimbursement Account (HRA), Health Savings Account (HSA), two dental plans, flexible spendingeligibility requirements vary by positionmedical plans vary by location

DUTIES: Support the Membership & Data Science pillar of the Enterprise Analytics Team. Will apply Data Science principles and technology to drive membership insights that will improve member engagement, shopping, retention, and growth.

Job responsibilities include:

Under the direction of the Manager of Data Science, formulate solutions to problems related to loyalty economics;Design analyses to support the development BJ’s engagement and loyalty strategies across all channels;Use the right statistical techniques to provide ad hoc data science support to drive data driven decision making and strategies across the membership, engagement, loyalty, CRM and member insight space;Partner in the creation of our engagement and personalization testing plans and provide “next level” insights related to the measurement of tests;Frame business problems and decompose their constituent parts for data science analysis and building new solutions;Build machine learning models and use applied statistics (supervised/unsupervised learning, lift modeling, linear/nonlinear programming, feature selection) to support the business;Certify all engagement and loyalty testing/measurement (hypothesis testing, A/B testing, design of experiment, sample size/power calculation);Communicate data science concepts/insights to non-technical audiences.

REQUIREMENTS: Master’s Degree or foreign equivalent in Data Analytics, Statistics, Business Intelligence, or related field or foreign equivalent, plus 3 years of as a Data Scientist, Statistician or related, Experience must include 3 years working in a retail environment with algorithms, building, deploying and maintaining machine learning models with high efficiency, data mining and big data analysis, designing end to end machine learning solutions and pipelines, performing hypothesis testing, sensitivity analysis and A/B testing, providing statistical analysis, Python, cloud computing (GCP/AWS), SQL, apply analytical and statistical techniques to provide insights on data. Experience may be gained concurrently.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: SR Data Scientist
output_json.summary: Support the Membership & Data Science pillar of the Enterprise Analytics Team.
preferred_degrees: foreign equivalent in Data Analytics, Statistics, Business Intelligence, or related field

Improve member engagement, shopping, retention, and growth

Provide ad hoc data science support to drive data-driven decision making and strategies

Frame business problems and decompose their constituent parts for data science analysis
Certify all engagement and loyalty testing/measurement
Communicate data science concepts/insights to non-technical audiences
